column1: #Text=I don't quite understand why American need any allies when their defense budget is more than top xx military spending countries combined.
#Text=It makes no sense in real war term unless you use it to control those 'allies'.
#Text=They are totally useless since it is not WW2 time.Chinese think it is quite laughable when American cry for allies in Asia when facing China.
#Text=It means you're so weak to hide behind someone else.
#Text=And Chinese understand perfectly none of them can be put to a real fight.
#Text=Allies are just BS in today's world.
